field.label: Remote Access Server
field.help: Select an OpenVPN server to export profiles for.

field.label: Hostname
field.help: Address(es) or hostname(s) to which this client should connect to separated by comma for multiple entries

field.label: Use random local port
field.help: Use a random local source port (lport) for traffic from the client. Without this set, two clients may not run concurrently.

field.label: P12 Password/confirm
field.help: Use a password to protect the pkcs12 file contents

field.label: Validate server subject
field.help: Verify the server certificate name when the client connects

field.label: Windows Certificate System Store
field.help: Load the certificate and private key from the Windows Certificate System Store (Windows/OpenSSL Only).

field.label: Disable password save
field.help: Sets auth-nocache in the exported configuration when password authentication is used. This prevents OpenVPN from caching passwords in memory.

field.label: Custom config
field.help: Custom configuration, which will be returned in the output file without modifications
